subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=𥇝,𥇡,𦎝,睾,𠬤-nonstandard simplification|note={{l|zh|睾}} - "[[testicle]]" used in mainland China and Hong Kong}}

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|副睪|附睪|副睪丸|睪丸|隱睪症|睪固酮|睪酮|隱睪}}

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text:
* In mainland China<!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/通用規范漢字表 (2013, Character 5763, not to be considered a simplified form of 睪) --> and Hong Kong<!-- Refer http://input.foruto.com/ccc/gongbiu/dzijingbiu/doc/dzijingbiu_list.pdf (Page 34, 目部, 14畫) -->, {{l|zh|睾}} is the orthodox form used for the pronunciation "[[gāo]]" meaning [[testicle]].
* In Taiwan, <big>睪</big> is the orthodox form while {{l|zh|睾}} is considered as a {{w|Variant Chinese character|variant form}} ({{l|zh|異體字}}) of <big>睪</big>.
